entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C

Wind: WSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
